title: CHI N'EMEREM (MERCIFUL GOD)
author: Jude Nnam
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (contemporary Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Intro
content: On'emere m mma, On'emere m mma
Ked ihem ga enye gi ezi, Nna mo Ony'obi oma
A gam aja Ya mma, a ga m aturu Ya mma mma
Ihe Chi n'emere m onu m apughi ikocha

sections.title: Verse 1
content: I na-aju m onye nyere m ndu mo
Ndu nke idi onye nyere gi eh
I na-aju m onye nyere m ahu ike
Ahu ike nke inwere onye nyere gi eh oh.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Ina eje eje na abata
O bu onye na-echebe gi n'ihe mberede
Nile nke ekwensu na-agba
O bu onye na-echebe gi n'ihe mberede oh

sections.title: Verse 3
content: O bu onye kere anyanwu na onwa
Ma kee kpakpando nile di n'eluigwe
O nyere mmadu echiche n'ihe nile n'uju
Nwannem soro m kele Chineke, Chi mo n'emere m ihe oma.

sections.title: Bass Refrain
content: Chi n'emere m mma n'ezie okwu, (Chinemere mo)
I ma na Chineke Nna bu ya bu, (O bu Chi) Chinnemere m'ihe oma

sections.title: Chorus
content: Abinci Alheri zamu ci
Abinci alheri eh, abinci rai
Shiryeye daga wurin Allah O!
Abinci alheri zamu ci
Shiryeye daga wurin Allah O!
Abinci alheri zamu ci
